name: Smorgasbord (Carcharocles)
description:
Smorgasbord!

You have been tasked by the king to gather food for the annual Smorgasbord banquet. Obtain local Nordic delicacies from villagers, but watch out for creepy bats lurking about.

Basic Controls

'W': Jump/climb
'A': Move left
'S': Bounce attack
'D': Move right
'Space': Ranged attack

Cheat Codes

'6': Remove a heart
'7': Gain a heart
'8': Reduce the number of food required to finish the stage

Tile Design Credits
